about_the_game:
Overview


Mission Pack 1 gives you the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story, beginning the first chapter of this tale. These missions bring a unique set of objectives to be completed that will push your strategic abilities beyond what has come before. With new cards, hostile units, and challenges for each Mission this pack takes Siberian Dawn and the Lore Engine to the next level.

Mission Pack 1 also adds a new Skirmish mission to Siberian Dawn using the content of this Mission Pack, and also adds the content from this DLC to "Skirmish S-0 Memory of Dawn" along with all other content owned.

If you own both Mission Pack 1 and 2 then you will also be able to play a Crisis for Chapter 1 built from the content of both these mission packs


Mission 1-1 Anarchy Rising


Mobs are gathering in Industrial Habitation IH-54 and anarchy threatens to destroy its productivity. Outcasts are rumoured to have been stirring up this dissent and it is believed they are connected to a cult called the Dawn. You must quell any hostile forces and remove the individuals that are fuelling this danger to our Union.

Mission 1-2 Grey Shadows


As the turmoil increases in IH-54 an informant has told us about a disillusioned leader of this revolt. He says this leader has vital information about what the Dawn cultists are really doing in IH-54. The informant demands a bribe to contact the leader but we do not know what the leader will demand.

Mission 1-3 Lost Souls


The data given by Stoenza shows Dawn cultists are holding several members of the Letalis Guild captive. We know the location they are being held in but not where they are being held inside the building. Find and rescue these captives before the Dawn can complete the dark plans they have for them.

Skirmish S-3 Industrial Revolt


Take on an industrial mob in a 30 Round Skirmish built with all content from Chapter 1 Part 1

Crisis C-2 First Dawn


Play a Crisis against the hostile forces of Chapter 1 (Requires Mission Pack 1 and 2)


Your Challenge


The Dawn is coming and it all starts here with Mission Pack 1. Have you got what it takes to face the challenges threatening Industrial Habitation IH-54? Uncover the secrets that built our Union before they can tear it all apart. Use your skills as an Overseer to save us all.

short_description: Mission Pack 1 gives you the full Core game of Siberian Dawn, adding 9 new Units to the Union Bloc and 9 new Units to the Guild Bloc, along with the Bond system. Mission Pack 1 also includes the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story. The full Siberian Dawn Core experience.
